SELECT memId, memName, memPhone, memEmail, memAddress, memRegDate FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, memId, memName, memPhone, memEmail, memAddress, memRegDate FROM ( SELECT MEMID as memId, MEMNAME as memName, MEMPHONE as memPhone, MEMEMAIL as memEmail, MEMADDRESS as memAddress, MEMREGDATE as memRegDate FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMID IS NOT NULL
AND MEMID LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
AND MEMNAME LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'
ORDER BY MEMREGDATE DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}
